label: 応天門
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the Great Heavenly Gate, which was the main gate of the greater palace precints (daidairi) at Heian. It opened on the precincts of the Halls of State (Chôdôin 朝堂院). [大内裏]
